programme.title: An Saol Beo
programme.desc: Caithfear súil sa gclár seo ar Rí na nIasc, an bradán, agus ar an turas a bhíonn le déanamh aige ar ais go dtí an abhainn. (This programme takes a look at the salmon.)

programme.title: An Ríl Deal
programme.desc: Tá TG4 sa tóir ar na chéad réaltaí móra eile i saol an damhsa Ghaelaigh. (The hunt begins for the next big thing in the world of Irish dancing.)

programme.title: France 24
programme.desc: Cainéal nuachta 24 uair an chloig na Fraince atá i France 24. (FRANCE 24 is France's 24 hour international news channel.)

programme.title: Cúla4
programme.desc: Níl aon easpa cláracha do dhaoine óga ar Cúla4 - bí ag spraoi agus ag foghlaim in éineacht linn. (Younger audiences will be spoilt for choice with Cúla4 - watch, play and learn.)

programme.title: Bréidín & Clúmh
programme.desc: Glanann Bréidín lorg lapaí Chlúmh le sean-scuab ingne. (Tweedy uses an old nail brush to clean up Fluff's muddy paw prints.)

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Tá an páiste ina chodladh ach tá na hainmhithe ag iarraidh é a dhúiseacht. (The baby is still asleep but all his animal friends want to try and wake him up.)

programme.title: CoComelon It's Cody Time
programme.desc: Is lá speisialta atá ann do Cody inniu! (It's Cody's special day at school!)

programme.title: CoComelon
programme.desc: Ó bhó! Tá an carr lofa! Oibreoidh muid le chéile chun é a ghlanadh! (Uh oh! The car is all dirty! Let's work together to clean it up!)

programme.title: Bíp Bíp Cory Carson
programme.desc: Tá rún ag Cory agus Freddie fanacht ina ndúiseacht go dtí meán oíche. (Cory and Freddie hatch a plan to stay awake until midnight.)

programme.title: Go Buster
programme.desc: Tá Buster ag spraoi sa bpuiteach agus téann sé i bhfostú i lochán puitigh. (It's a lovely sunny day and Buster is merrily playing in the mud!)

programme.title: Go Buster
programme.desc: Tá Buster clúdaithe i bpuiteach ach bíonn faitíos air dul isteach sa niteoir carranna. (Buster is covered in mud but he is too afraid to go into the car wash.)

programme.title: Go Buster
programme.desc: Bailíonn Buster an iomarca balún agus tosaíonn sé ag eitilt san aer. (Buster and Robin manage to catch some balloons with some quite unexpected results!)

programme.title: Elmo Anseo
programme.desc: Ag foghlaim faoi scamaill a bheidh Elmo inniu. (Elmo is learning all about clouds today.)

programme.title: Olobob Top
programme.desc: Cruthaíonn na hOlobobanna Caimil-amú atá in ann imeacht as radharc in éineacht le Bobble! (The Olobobs create Chamelegone who disappears before their eyes together with Bobble!)

programme.title: Igam Ogam
programme.desc: Tá Igam Ogam ag ligean uirthi féin go bhfuil sí an-ghnóthach sa gcaoi is nach mbeidh uirthi dada a dhéanamh. (To avoid having to do things, Igam Ogam claims to be busy.)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Tá deis iompair nua ag Catboy agus Owlette. (Catboy and Owlette build a new vehicle of discovery and exploration, the PJ Sub.)

programme.title: Wussywat
programme.desc: Tá a ghlór caillte ag Lachachrogall agus socraíonn Wussywat dul sa tóir air. (When Duckadile loses his squeak, Wussywat decides to find it.)

programme.title: Kid E Cats
programme.desc: Téann na piscíní ar thuras traenach lena dtuistí. (The kittens and their parents take a trip on the train.)

programme.title: Clifford
programme.desc: Tá iarsmalann ag Clifford de na rudaí ar fad a caitheadh amach ar fud an bhaile thar na blianta. (Clifford has set up a museum.)

programme.title: Vegesaurs
programme.desc: Tógann Bokchoydachtalach Minty ar ais chuig a nead. (Minty tries to fly and is mistaken for a baby Bokchoydactyl by its mother.)

programme.title: Momonsters
programme.desc: Foghlaimíonn na Momonsters conas cístí beaga milse a dhéanamh ach níl sé éasca! (The Momonsters learn how to make cupcakes but it's tricky!)

programme.title: Dot
programme.desc: Caithfidh Dot feabhas a chur ar a cuid damhsa don chóisir damhsa. (Dot has to improve her dance moves for the dance party.)

programme.title: Cúla4

programme.title: Charlie agus Lola
programme.desc: Tá Lola ag iarraidh damhsa nua a fhoghlaim. (Lola tries to find a dance that suits her.)

programme.title: Baile Beag Draíochtúil Pinocchio
programme.desc: Tagann banphrionsa ardnósach ar cuairt. (A very grand princess visits the village.)

programme.title: Banainmhithe
programme.desc: Bíonn an-imní ar Bhriain go ngortófar é. (Byron must overcome his fear of getting hurt.)

programme.title: Jamie's Got Tentacles
programme.desc: Scríobhann Praline litir chuig an FBI. (Praline writes a letter to the FBI.)

programme.title: Dónall Dána
programme.desc: Bhí Dónall ag iarraidh go mbeadh leathchúpla dána aige le fada an lá. (Dónall always wanted to know what life would be like if he had a twin brother.)

programme.title: Cúla4

programme.title: Super Simple Amhráin
programme.desc: Amhrán spraíúil faoi chúig lacha bheaga. (A fun song about five little ducks.)

programme.title: Blocuimhreacha
programme.desc: Is Sár-Dhronuilleog é Blocuimhir a Dó Dhéag! (Ten and Two make Twelve, who discovers he is a super-rectangle with amazing special powers.)

programme.title: Blocdhathanna
programme.desc: Cuireann chuile dhuine aithne ar Ghlas Líoma inniu. (Today, everyone meets Lime for the first time.)

programme.title: Pramsáil
programme.desc: Tá Roy agus Caitríona sáinnithe i scuaine mhór fhada! (Roy and Caitríona are stuck in a big, long queue!)

programme.title: Lá Le Mamó nó Daideo
programme.desc: Tá Megan leis an lá a chaitheamh in éineacht lena Daideo Páraic. (Megan is going to spend the day with Daideo Páraic.)

programme.title: Ó a Sheáin
programme.desc: Tá Seán ag ligean air féin gur draíodóir é atá ag iarraidh lacha a tharraingt as hata. (Seán pretends he's a magician today, trying to remove a duck from his hat.)

programme.title: Pip & Posy
programme.desc: Déanann Pip agus Posy eireaball mhaighdean mhara sa ngaineamh do Zac. (Pip and Posy make Zac a mermaid's tail out of sand.)

programme.title: Béiríní is a Leabhair
programme.desc: Faigheann Bromaire amach nach gach duine ar maith leo a chluiche. (Bromaire learns to respect how his playful actions may not seem fun for everyone.)

programme.title: Béiríní is a Leabhair
programme.desc: Faigheann cairde Ghobnatan amach go gcaithfidh siad meas a bheith acu uirthi. (Gobnait's friends learn to respect her right to do things the way she wants.)

programme.title: Pikwik Pack
programme.desc: Tá iontas ar Phaca Pikwik go bhfuil pacáiste tagtha do Shlíomach, an t-iora dána! (The Pikwik Pack are surprised when a package arrives for Sneaky Squirrel.)

programme.title: Nuair a Bheidh Mé Mór
programme.desc: Samhlaíonn Ruarc a shaol ina stiúrthóir teilifíse nuair a bheidh sé mór le cúnamh ó Shióg na bPost. (Ruarc imagines his life as a TV Director when he grows up.)

programme.title: Daisy & Ollie
programme.desc: Tá Daidí ag iarraidh cáca a dhéanamh do bhreithlá Boo ach níl na comhábhair ar fad aige. (Daddy doesn't have all the ingredients to make a special birthday cake for Boo.)

programme.title: Dot
programme.desc: Tá bealach nua ag Dot le madraí a ní. (Dot has a new way to clean dogs.)

programme.title: Ainmhithe Craiceáilte
programme.desc: Pearóidí ar ghluaisrothair, turcaí olc agus béar in ionad campála a bheidh againn inniu. (We have motorcycle-riding parrots, an angry turkey & a bear stops by a campsite.)

programme.title: Comhrá

programme.title: The Wonder Years
programme.desc: Faigheann Rose, aintín Kevin, bás agus cé nach raibh aon aithne aige uirthi goilleann an tsochraid go mór air. (Kevin has his first confrontation with death.)

programme.title: Geantraí
programme.desc: Rinneadh taifeadadh ar an gclár seo in Campbell's Tavern i gContae na Gaillimhe. Á chur i láthair ag Mairtín O'Connor. (This programme comes from Campbell's Tavern in Co. Galway.)

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Déantar Rose a thástáil le haghaidh SEIF mar go bhféadfadh sé go bhfuair sí fuilaistriú truaillithe. (Rose is tested for AIDS following a blood transfusion.)

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Caithfidh Jessica teacht ar an té a dhúnmharaigh dlúthchara léi. (Jessica must find the murderer of her close friend.)
